TestStep.Description: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

Command.Text: Select the creditcard application with a plain select Application APDU

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: command = new ByteString("00 A4 04 00 0E 31 50 41 59 2E 53 59 53 2E 44 44 46 30 31 00", HEX); fci = card.gt_sendCommand(command);

ExpectedResult.Text: The select command responces with the fci (file control information). First byte is '6F'
ExpectedResult.TechnicalResult: assertStatusWord(new Array("9000"), card.SW.toString(HEX), FAILURE); assertMatchValue("6F", fci.bytes(0,1), FAILURE);
